Articles.Content: This update hypetrain will have over 500 posts
You are not GregoxMun. You cannot drive the hypetrain. You must be trained by him first. I think this is still too early for a hypetrain anyway.
No no no no. Gregox drives the train, and it won't leave until Experimentals.
All hype must die. Stop the hype.
The hypetrain is sitting at the depot and the hype plane is in the cargo bay. You'll know when it's time...
